title: Parent-Teacher Conference Schedule
content: Parent-teacher conferences will be held next week from March 15-17. Please sign up for your preferred time slot through the school portal.
author: Principal Smith

title: Science Fair Registration Open
content: The annual science fair registration is now open for grades 9-12. Projects are due by April 30th. See Ms. Johnson for project guidelines.
author: Ms. Johnson

title: Staff Meeting - New Curriculum Updates
content: All teaching staff are required to attend the curriculum meeting on Friday at 3:30 PM in the main conference room. We'll discuss the new math and science standards.
author: Principal Smith

title: School Library Hours Extended
content: Starting next week, the school library will be open until 6 PM on weekdays to provide additional study space for students preparing for midterm exams.
author: Librarian Davis
